parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the seat belt buckle can lead to occupants becoming trapped, requiring emergency cutting of the seat belt to extricate them, which can cause injuries and increase the risk of accidents.
symptoms: The seat belt buckle jams
the seat belt becomes stuck
the seat belt cannot be released
the seat belt must be cut to release occupants.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the seat belt during an accident can cause injuries to occupants, reducing the effectiveness of the safety feature and potentially leading to more severe consequences.
symptoms: The seat belt fails to restrain the occupant
the seat belt breaks or tears
the occupant is injured due to seat belt failure.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: A faulty bolt in the hinge of the driver's seat can cause the seat to break, leading to a loss of control and increasing the risk of accidents or injuries.
symptoms: The driver's seat breaks or becomes loose
the seat hinge fails
the seat is unable to maintain its position.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the seat latches can cause the seats to fold or become dislodged during an accident, increasing the risk of injuries or fatalities.
symptoms: The middle and rear bench seats fold or become dislodged during an accident
the seat latches disconnect
the seats are not securely fastened.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure to repair a recall can lead to continued safety risks, as the recalled component or system remains faulty and potentially hazardous.
symptoms: The dealer fails to repair a recalled component or system
the recall is not completed
the vehicle remains in an unsafe condition.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: An inadequate repair of a recalled seat can lead to continued safety risks, as the seat may still be loose or faulty, increasing the risk of accidents or injuries.
symptoms: The driver's side seat is loose after repair
the seat is not properly secured
the recall repair is incomplete.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the steering column can cause a loss of control of the vehicle, leading to accidents and potential injuries.
symptoms: The steering wheel is very loose
the steering wheel falls down while driving
momentary loss of control of the vehicle.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the power steering pump bracket can cause the serpentine belt to fail, leading to a loss of power steering assist and potentially causing accidents.
symptoms: The power steering pump bracket breaks
causing bolts to break off
serpentine belt failure.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the rear brakes can cause the vehicle to lose stopping power, leading to increased stopping distances, loss of control, and potential accidents.
symptoms: The brake pedal goes to the floor
the rear brakes will not work
the brakes require pumping multiple times to engage
the vehicle fishtails or loses traction when braking
the vehicle takes longer to stop than usual.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the rear brakes to self-adjust can cause uneven brake wear, reduced stopping power, and increased risk of accidents.
symptoms: The rear brakes do not self-adjust
all braking is done by the front brakes
the vehicle fishtails or loses traction when braking
the vehicle takes longer to stop than usual.
